name: Payment transfer request meeting limit criteria but creditor account is not active.

testSteps.description: Given a payment request of amount "100.000" is received via messaging services
When the payment details are inserted in the database
Then success message and response is received
When the systemA is queried for the debitor and creditor account status and available balance
Then success response is received for account with active status
And success response for balance query is received when the account balance is greater than the transaction amount
When systemA is queried for creditor account
Then failure response is received for account with inactive status
And the payment status is updated to failed in the database

userStory.storyName: Payment transfer request scenarios for amount less than 1.000.000 euro, meeting transaction limit criteria.

featureTag.name: Featurefiles/Payment transfer request scenarios for amount less than 1.000.000 euro, meeting transaction limit criteria.

title: Payment transfer request meeting limit criteria but creditor account is not active.
